name: Stripes a color library
description:
Make your next project stand out by using some unique color styles. Stripes is a vast library of 1500+ digital colors with values and their specific names.



Quicky access these colors!

Add the color styles to your library and access them from the assets panel in the left sidebar.


One more thing..

I have also created one more plugin called Typeout a rich, relevant and quirky library of UX copies to make your designs more conversational and meaningful ðŸ”®
